gui.chocobook.page1:
Table of Contents

I. Chocobos
II. In the wild
III. Gysahl Greens
 .1 Gysahl Mutations
 .2 Gysahl Pickles
IV. Domestication
 .1 Breeding Chocobos
 .2 Chocobo Colours
V. The Nether
VI. Chocobo Pen
VII. Chocobo Cake
gui.chocobook.page10:
III.2 Gysahl Pickles

Gysahl Greens and sugar can be crafted into raw Gysahl pickles, which can be cooked in a furnace to receive Gysahl pickles. These treats are not only tasty, but also very nourishing.
gui.chocobook.page11:
IV. Domestication

Chocobos can be tamed by feeding them Gysahl Greens, the birds are very fond of the root vegetable and will sometimes form a bond to whomever is feeding them their fa- vorite food item. If tamed, the owner can fit either a chocobo
gui.chocobook.page12: saddle or pack bags on a Chocobo. Fitted with a saddle the Chocobo can be additionally equipped with saddle bags. (§oPack bags and saddle bags can be accessed by shift-right click§r).
gui.chocobook.page13:
IV.1 Chocobo Breeding

If feed with Loverly or Golden Gysahls, Chocobos of different gender can be breed to produce an off- spring. These infant Chocobos are called Chicobos and even- tually grow into a Chocobo. Besides in- creasing the number
gui.chocobook.page14: of Chocobos in a domesticated flock, breeding is the only way to obtain the different varieties of Chocobos available. There is a slight chance of mutation, which can be in- creased with the use of Golden Gysahls. The following combinations of parents can cause
gui.chocobook.page15:
their offspring to mutate into these subspecies:

 1. §6Yellow§0 + §6Yellow§0
 = §aGreen§0 or §9Blue§0

 2. §aGreen§0 + §9Blue§0
 = §7White§0

 3. §6Yellow§0 + §7White§0
 = Black
gui.chocobook.page16:
4. Black + §7White§0
 = §6Gold§0

To enable the off- spring to mutate into a golden Chocobo, the use of Golden Gysahls is mandatory.
gui.chocobook.page17:
IV.2 Chocobo Colours

§6Yellow Chocobos§0 are the average variety and have no clear abilities, they can be used however as fast riding and transport animals.

§aGreen Chocobos§0 have the ability to climb, which means they do
gui.chocobook.page18:
not have the need to jump when ascending a block level. They are slightly faster than their yellow cousins.

§9Blue Chocobos§0 have the ability to travel fast on water. Al- though all Chocobos have the ability to swim, the blue ones can do it very fast,
gui.chocobook.page19:
thus are the first choice of transpor- tation when traveling by water route.

§7White Chocobos§0 have the combined abilities to climb like the green Chocobos and to travel fast on water like the blue. In ad- dition they are slightly faster than the blue
gui.chocobook.page2:
I. Chocobos

These large, herbiv- orous birds are largely unable to fly, but their powerful legs allow them to run at high speeds. Their size and impressive speed make them a popular choice when looking for a mount.
gui.chocobook.page20:
or green varieties.

Black Chocobos have the abilities to jump very hight, climb and travel fast on water. Also they are faster than the white ones.

§6Golden Chocobos§0 are the fastes variety and are not only able to glide like the other
gui.chocobook.page21:
subspecies, but can fully fly.

All Chocobo sub- species can glide and avoid fall damage up to a certain hight. Golden Chocobos don't take fall damage at all.
gui.chocobook.page22:
V. The Nether

The Nether is popu- lated by a special breed of Chocobo. The Purple Chocobos roaming the hostile tunnels and caves of the nether in search of the scarce avail- able food. This makes them even harder to find than their yellow
gui.chocobook.page23: cousins. Living in the nether had the purple Chocobos develop the ability to swim in lava and fly.
gui.chocobook.page24:
VI. Chocobo Pen

An area covered with straw and equipped with a water filled cauldron will count as a Chocobo pen. If a hurt Chocobo will stand on the straw near the cauldron it will automatically heal over time.
gui.chocobook.page25:
VII. Chocobo Cake

Chocobo Cakes can be used to have Chicobos instantly grow up into Chocobos.

Recipe:
Take an egg, mix it with two units of sugar, two buckets of milk and two bundles of grain. Finally garnish it with two Gysahl Greens.
Enjoy.
gui.chocobook.page3:
Although largely too small to allow real flight, the Chocobo's wings enable the birds to glide and avoid fall damage to itself and its rider up to a cer- tain hight.

Domesticated Chocobos can be deployed as mounts and transport animals.
gui.chocobook.page4: There are even re- ports of desperate adventurers having to relyto their Chocobos as a source of food.
gui.chocobook.page5:
II. In the wild

Chocobos, in their yellow variety, found wild in most parts of the world. Flocks of mostly three, some- times five animals roam free in the wild. How- ever they are very scarce and an inter- ested ornithologist would have to search
gui.chocobook.page6: wide areas to find a flock.
gui.chocobook.page7:
III. Gysahl Greens

The Chocobo's fa- vorite food are Gysahl Greens, these thick red root vegetables can be found growing widespread in all fertile areas. These plants can be crafted into seeds. The seeds then can be used to domestically grow
gui.chocobook.page8: Gysahl Greens on tilted and moisturised land.
gui.chocobook.page9:
III.1 Gysahl Mutations

When domestically growing Gysahl Greens, there is a chance of the root mutating into a Loverly or even Golden Gysahl. These special roots can be feed to two Chocobos of opposite gender, to initialise the mating process.
info.chococraft.book.chicobo.entry.name: Chocobito
info.chococraft.book.chicobo.text1: Chocobitos son las crías de los $(l:chococraft:chocobos/chocobo)chocobos$() que se obtienen al reproducirlos.$(br)Pueden crecer al instante alimentándolos con $(l:chococraft:gysahls/gysahl_cake)tarta gysahl$() después de ser domesticados.
info.chococraft.book.chocobo.black.descr: Se obtiene reproduciendo chocobos blancos y amarillos.
Se desplazan más rápido que el chocobo blanco, además de poder saltar más alto y dan visión nocturna.
info.chococraft.book.chocobo.blue.descri: Se obtiene reproduciendo dos chocobos amarillos.
Se desplazan el doble de rápido que los chocobos normales sobre el agua y dan apnea.
info.chococraft.book.chocobo.entry.name: Chocobo
info.chococraft.book.chocobo.flame.descr: Sólo se pueden obtener encontrándolos en el Nether.
Tienen las mismas habilidades que el chocobo dorado (excepto que es un poco más lento).
info.chococraft.book.chocobo.gold.descri: Se obtiene reproduciendo chocobos blancos y negros. La cría de un chocobo dorado con otro chocobo dorado usando verduras gysahl doradas siempre resultará en una cría dorada.
Son capaces de volar, trepar, nadar y son inmunes al daño por caída. Están empatados en rapidez con los chocobos rosa y rojo.
info.chococraft.book.chocobo.green.descr: Se obtiene reproduciendo dos chocobos amarillos.
Puede subir por muros de dos bloques de altura.
info.chococraft.book.chocobo.pink.descri: Sólo se pueden obtener alimentando a los chocobos dorados con una verdura gysahl rosa.
Tienen las mismas habilidades que el chocobo dorado.
info.chococraft.book.chocobo.purple.desc: Tienen las mismas habilidades que el chocobo llameante.
info.chococraft.book.chocobo.red.descrip: Sólo se pueden obtener alimentando chocobos dorados con una verdura gysahl roja.
Tienen las mismas habilidades que el chocobo dorado.
info.chococraft.book.chocobo.text: Los chocobos son criaturas pasivas, pero temen a los jugadores así que sé cuidadoso con ellos.
info.chococraft.book.chocobo.text2: Los chocobos amarillos aparecen en biomas de llanuras y colinas. Los chocobos llameantes aparecen en el Nether. Sin embargo, se pueden obtener chocobos de diferentes colores reproduciéndolos con $(l:chococraft:gysahls/loverly_gysahl)verduras gysahl preciosas$() (20%% de probabilidad de un nuevo color con nuevas y mejores habilidades) o $(l:chococraft:gysahls/gold_gysahl)doradas$() (50% de probabilidad). Las $(l:chococraft:gysahls/gold_gysahl)verduras gysahl doradas$() son OBLIGATORIAS para obtener un chocobo dorado al reproducirlos.
info.chococraft.book.chocobo.text3: Un grupo de chocobos se aparecen en un bioma de llanura cerca de una montaña.
info.chococraft.book.chocobo.text4: Los chocobos se reproducen alimentándolos con verduras gysahl doradas o preciosas. Todos los chocobos pueden reproducirse juntos, pero sólo entre los machos y las hembras.
info.chococraft.book.chocobo.white.descr: Se obtiene reproduciendo chocobos verdes y azules.
Se desplazan más rápido que los chocobos amarillos, verdes o azules y son capaces de nadar y trepar.
info.chococraft.book.chocodisguise.text1: El chocodisfraz es un conjunto de armadura que se puede usar para reducir el riesgo de que los $(l:chococraft:chocobos/chocobo)chocobos$() chocobos salvajes huyan cuando te acercas.
info.chococraft.book.feather.entry.name: Chocobo Feather
info.chococraft.book.feather.text1: $(l:chococraft:chocobos/chocobo)Chocobos$() every so often shed feathers. They are useful for crafting a $(l:chococraft:equipments/chocodisguise)Choco Disguise$() armor set.
info.chococraft.book.gold_gysahl.text1: La $(bold)verdura gysahl dorada$() es una mutación de la ordinaria $(l:chococraft:gysahls/gysahl_green)verdura gysahl$() y se utiliza para reproducir a los $(l:chococraft:chocobos/chocobo)chocobos$().$(br)La $(bold)verdura gysahl dorada$() se puede obtener cosechando $(l:chococraft:gysahls/gysahl_green)verduras gysahl$(), hay un 5%% de conseguir una $(bold)verdura gysahl dorada$().$(br)Las variantes mutadas de $(l:chococraft:gysahls/gysahl_green)verdura gysahl$() no se pueden convertir en semillas.
info.chococraft.book.gysahl_cake.text1: Las tartas gysahl se usan para convertir instantáneamente a un $(l:chococraft:chocobos/chicobo)chocobito$() en un $(l:chococraft:chocobos/chocobo)chocobo$().$(br)Primero debes domesticar al $(l:chococraft:chocobos/chicobo)chocobito$() para alimentarlo con una tarta gysahl. No se puede colocar.
info.chococraft.book.gysahl_green.text1: Las verduras gysahl se pueden encontrar por todo el mundo en pequeñas parcelas. La verdura gysahl se puede utilizar para domesticar y curar a los $(l:chococraft:chocobos/chocobo)chocobos$().$(br)Para poder domesticar a un $(l:chococraft:chocobos/chocobo)chocobo$() tienes que alimentarlo con una verdura gysahl. Una vez domesticado, mostrará un collar similar al de los lobos domesticados.
info.chococraft.book.gysahl_green.text2: Una parcela de verduras gysahl se aparecen en un bioma de llanura.
info.chococraft.book.gysahl_green.text3: La verdura gysahl se puede cultivar plantando semillas de verdura gysahl. Después de cosechar la verdura gysahl silvestre, el jugador puede convertirla en semillas de verdura gysahl.
info.chococraft.book.gysahl_green.text4: Las semillas se pueden plantar en tierras de cultivo como la mayoría de los otros cultivos. Cuando el cultivo madura y es cosechado hay un 15%% de obtener una $(l:chococraft:gysahls/loverly_gysahl)verdura gysahl preciosa$() y un 5%% de obtener una $(l:chococraft:gysahls/gold_gysahl)verdura gysahl dorada$().
info.chococraft.book.landing: La chocopedia es tu guía para Chococraft 4. Contiene información sobre todas las diferentes habilidades y objetos que puedes utilizar en Chococraft 4.
info.chococraft.book.legacy.desc: El texto original que se puede encontrar en la chocopedia original.
info.chococraft.book.legacy.entry.name: Información heredada
info.chococraft.book.legacy.name: Original
info.chococraft.book.loverly_gysahl.text: La $(bold)verdura gysahl preciosa$() es una mutación de la ordinaria $(l:chococraft:gysahls/gysahl_green)verdura gysahl$() y se utiliza para reproducir $(l:chococraft:chocobos/chocobo)chocobos$().$(br)La $(bold)verdura gysahl preciosa$() se puede obtener cosechando $(l:chococraft:gysahls/gysahl_green)verduras gysahl$(), hay un 15%% de conseguir una $(bold)verdura gysahl preciosa$()
info.chococraft.book.pickled_gysahl.text: La verdura gysahl encurtida es un alimento que se puede elaborar a partir de la $(l:chococraft:info/gysahl_verde)verdura gysahl$().$(br)La versión cruda no se puede comer, hay que cocinarla para que sea comestible.
info.chococraft.book.pink_gysahl.text1: La $(bold)verdura gysahl rosa$() es una mutación de la ordinaria $(l:chococraft:gysahls/gysahl_green)verdura gysahl$() y sirve para convertir un $(l:chococraft:chocobos/chocobo#gold)chocobo dorado$() en un $(l:chococraft:chocobos/chocobo#pink)chocobo rosa$().
info.chococraft.book.raw_drumstick.text1: La pata de chocobo cruda es un alimento que se puede obtener matando $(l:chococraft:chocobos/chocobo)chocobos$().
info.chococraft.book.red_gysahl.text1: La $(bold)verdura gysahl roja$() es una mutación de la ordinaria $(l:chococraft:gysahls/gysahl_green)verdura gysahl$() y sirve para convertir un $(l:chococraft:chocobos/chocobo#gold)chocobo dorado$() en un $(l:chococraft:chocobos/chocobo#red)chocobo rojo$().
info.chococraft.book.saddle.entry.name: Montura de chocobo
info.chococraft.book.saddle.text1: La montura de chocobo te permite montar tu $(l:chococraft:chocobos/chocobo)chocobo$() domesticado.$(br)Hay diferentes tipos de monturas, la variante básica sólo te permite montar el chocobo, mientras que otras también conceden espacio de almacenamiento en el $(l:chococraft:chocobos/chocobo)chocobo$().
info.chococraft.book.saddle.text2: Las $(bold)alforjas de chocobo$() te dan acceso a 18 ranuras de inventario.$(br)Los $(bold)estuche de chocobo$() te dan acceso a 45 ranuras de inventario.
info.chococraft.book.straw.entry.name: Paja
info.chococraft.book.straw.text1: Los bloques de paja se pueden colocar en el corral de tu $(l:chococraft:chocobos/chocobo)chocobo$() para permitir que se cure naturalmente cuando este dentro del corral.
info.chococraft.book.subtitle: Guía de Chococraft
info.chocopedia.book.name: Chocopedia
chococraft.entity_chocobo.not_owner: §cYou are not the owner of this Chocobo!
info.chococraft.book.chocobos.name: Chocobos
info.chococraft.book.equipments.desc: These entries contain information about the Tools & Equipments of ChocoCraft 4
info.chococraft.book.equipments.name: Tools & Equipments
info.chococraft.book.gysahls.desc: These entries contain information about Gysahls
info.chococraft.book.gysahls.name: Gysahls
info.chococraft.book.misc.desc: These entries contain information about other stuff from ChocoCraft 4.
info.chococraft.book.misc.name: Misc
info.chococraft.book.whistle.entry.name: Chocobo Whistle
info.chococraft.book.whistle.text1: The Chocobo Whistle allows you to command your tamed $(l:chococraft:chocobos/chocobo)Chocobos$() by right-clicking them with it. $(br2)There are three commands that you can do, $(o)Wander$(), $(o)Follow$(), and $(o)Stay$().
